scripts.generate: npm run generate:themes && npm run generate:js
scripts.build-dev:css: npm run generate:themes && vite build --config vite.config.build.css.ts --mode development
scripts.build-dev:js: npm run generate:js && vite build --config vite.config.build.js.ts --mode development
scripts.build:css: npm run generate:themes && vite build --config vite.config.build.css.ts --mode production
scripts.build:js: npm run generate:js && vite build --config vite.config.build.js.ts --mode production
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev:js && && npm run build-dev:css
scripts.build: npm run generate && vite build --config vite.config.build.ts --mode development -- --theme=defaultt
